abstract: Hugues-Denver Akassy, who is accused of stalking and raping five New York City women, repeatedly drifts off on tangents during his testimony in State Supreme Court in Manhattan.
snippet: Hugues-Denver Akassy, on trial in Manhattan for charges including stalking and rape against five women, told jurors his side of the story.
lead_paragraph: Hugues-Denver Akassy, on trial in Manhattan for charges including stalking and rape against five women, told jurors his side of the story.

headline.main: Man Charged With Rape Testifies About His Encounters
headline.print_headline: Man Charged With Rape Testifies About His Encounters
headline.seo: Hugues-Denver Akassy, Charged With Rape, Testifies
